Sourabh Panadare

FrontEnd / Javascript Developer

Sourabh Panadare

Front End Engineer from Mumbai, India

I'm an experienced Javascript / UI Developer, with in-depth knowledge in HTML, CSS and native Javascript. I am a quick learner about latest web technologies. I have successfully delivered smart cutting-edge user interfaces and production-ready web development codes.

With precision, skill, and craftsmanship, I have used my unique knowledge in designing the front end and back end technologies to create cross-browser experiences. My primary focus has been the long-term user retention and engagement.
